item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

But that is not efficient at all. For what you’re saying, it would be easier to do this:

&& (playerRights >= 1 && player rights <= 3)

Read full topic

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @_BBLLAARRGGHH __--BBLLAARRGGHH--__
item.description:
@_BBLLAARRGGHH wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:9, topic:288706”]See, your problem is that it looks like the donator has a higher rights value(maybe that’s the 10 in your first post), so if the statement test if the rights is >= 3, 10 is > than 3, so it will work anyways. Your best bet is to do what Blaargh did, or something like this:

if(command.startsWith("admin") && playerRights == 3) { toX = 3413; toY = 3489; sM("Welcome in admins zone !"); }[/quote]
In addition, you could have for player rights

&& playerRights == 1 || playerRights == 2 || playerRights == 3

Read full topic

item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

See, your problem is that it looks like the donator has a higher rights value(maybe that’s the 10 in your first post), so if the statement test if the rights is >= 3, 10 is > than 3, so it will work anyways. Your best bet is to do what Blaargh did, or something like this:

if(command.startsWith("admin") && playerRights == 3) { toX = 3413; toY = 3489; sM("Welcome in admins zone !"); }

if(command.startsWith("admin") && playerRights >= 3 && !playerRights == #) { toX = 3413; toY = 3489; sM("Welcome in admins zone !"); }

is the rank. Something like that, that might not work though

item.title: Need help

Crowns are client site… out.write(2); is the color crown, I believe. (silver, gold) Rather than using >= in your command, use ==.

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @wonderspring wonderspring
item.description:
@wonderspring wrote:

I just add a donator staff case 10: // donator premium = true; break;

So right now Donator have acces to all commands i created.

My question is how i add at this command :

if(command.startsWith("admin") && playerRights >= 3) { toX = 3413; toY = 3489; sM("Welcome in admins zone !"); }

A code that only admins and only admin can use it , not donators or anyone .
